snippet.title: The American Dream - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Look down the barrel of a future where all your everyday needs are solved with guns. Samurai Punk presents The American Dream, a satirical virtual reality trip through a 1950’s world’s fair where you learn to live your life with guns.
_
Please like and comment on this video and subscribe to VRFocus for more virtual reality related videos.  You can find out more about what's going on in the worlds of virtual reality (VR), augmented reality (AR) and mixed reality (MR) by going to our website (http://vrfocus.com/) or following us on Twitter (http://twitter.com/vrfocus) or Facebook (http://facebook.com/vrfocus). Be sure to hit that notification bell too so YouTube keeps you up to date!
